text: (Musrikon az rui gumonason) guftand: «Inho corpojonu kistzoroni man'kardasuda hastand. Hec kas cuz on, ki mo ʙixohem, naʙojad az onho ʙixurad». Va corpojone hastand, ki savor sudanason ʙar hama hol harom ast va corpojone hastand, ki nomi Allohro dar vaqti istifodaʙarii onho jod nakunand, ʙa Alloh duruƣ meʙandand va ʙa zudi ʙa cazoi duruƣe, ki meʙastaand, cazojasonro xohad dod
